title: Dark Tourism: Destinations of Death, Tragedy and the Macabre
description: Travelers who use their off time to visit places like the Chernobyl nuclear plant or current conflict zones say they no longer want a sanitized version of a troubled world.
dc:creator: Maria Cramer
media:credit: Ko Sasaki for The New York Times
media:description: The Aokigahara forest in Japan, known as the suicide forest, is a dark tourism destination.
